detectors.description:

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract UVO (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#88-212) has payable functions:
	 - UVO.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#200-202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
UVO.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#134-139) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#136)

detectors.description:
UVO.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#166-172) can write the state variable array at will

	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#169)
